definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: He’s a craftsman whose specialties include hand-made bullets and silencers.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位手工藝者，長於土製子彈和消音器。

sentences.english: He bought some home-made explosives from the street traders.
sentences.chinese: 商販那兒買了一些土製炸藥。

sentences.english: Put the images together and the clay figures appear to be moving.
sentences.chinese: 將圖片整合到一起，黏土製的人物就好像會動一樣。
